title: Add dental equipment photos, patient-doctor images, and team section with 3 doctors

requirements.summary: Create DoctorsSection component displaying three dental professionals with profile cards
acceptanceCriteria: DoctorsSection component displays exactly 3 doctor profile cards
First doctor is Dr. Anas Jadla
Second doctor is Dr. Farhan Bangra
Third doctor is Dr. Jainul Aabedin
Each card shows doctor name and a profile photo placeholder
Section uses consistent styling matching the Oraa Care Smile design system

file_operations.description: Create DoctorsSection component that displays three doctor profile cards in a responsive grid layout. Each card includes the doctor's name, professional title/specialization, and profile image from frontend/public/assets/generated/doctor-anas-jadla.dim_400x400.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/doctor-farhan-bangra.dim_400x400.png, and frontend/public/assets/generated/doctor-jainul-aabedin.dim_400x400.png. Use consistent styling with the existing design system (cards, shadows, spacing). Include a section heading 'Meet Our Expert Dentists' or similar. Ensure responsive grid layout that adapts to mobile, tablet, and desktop viewports.

requirements.summary: Add DoctorsSection to HomePage between WhyChooseUsSection and TestimonialsSection
acceptanceCriteria: DoctorsSection is rendered on the homepage
Section appears after Why Choose Us and before Testimonials
Section integrates smoothly with page flow and responsive layout

file_operations.description: Import the DoctorsSection component and add it to the HomePage render sequence. Position it after WhyChooseUsSection and before TestimonialsSection. Ensure proper spacing and integration with the existing page flow. The updated rendering order should be: HeroSection, ServicesSection, WhyChooseUsSection, DoctorsSection, TestimonialsSection, ContactSection.

requirements.summary: Update HeroSection with professional dental office background image showing equipment and patient-doctor interaction
acceptanceCriteria: Hero section displays a professional dental office background image
Background image includes visible dental equipment
Background image shows patient-doctor interaction
Image maintains visual hierarchy with overlay text remaining readable

file_operations.description: Update the HeroSection background to use the generated hero banner image at frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-dental-office.dim_1920x800.png. Ensure the background image is properly sized and positioned. Add a semi-transparent overlay if needed to maintain text readability over the background. Update background styling to use the new image while preserving the existing text hierarchy and CTA buttons. Test that the image loads correctly and maintains proper aspect ratio across different screen sizes.

requirements.summary: Add dental equipment and patient care imagery to ServicesSection cards
acceptanceCriteria: Services section displays multiple dental equipment images
At least one image shows a patient with a dentist
Images are contextually relevant to the services being showcased
Images maintain professional quality and healthcare aesthetic

file_operations.description: Update the ServicesSection to include contextual images for dental services. Add the following images to relevant service cards: frontend/public/assets/generated/service-cleaning.dim_600x400.png for teeth cleaning/checkup services, frontend/public/assets/generated/service-root-canal.dim_600x400.png for root canal services, and frontend/public/assets/generated/service-implants.dim_600x400.png for implant services. Additionally, incorporate frontend/public/assets/generated/dental-equipment-1.dim_800x600.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/dental-equipment-2.dim_800x600.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/patient-doctor-exam.dim_800x600.png, and frontend/public/assets/generated/patient-doctor-consultation.dim_800x600.png as decorative or background elements within the section. Ensure images are properly sized, maintain aspect ratios, and include alt text for accessibility. Images should enhance the service cards without overwhelming the text content.

requirements.summary: Add photo gallery to WhyChooseUsSection showcasing dental equipment and patient-doctor interactions
acceptanceCriteria: Why Choose Us section includes multiple professional photos
Photos showcase dental equipment and technology
At least one photo shows patient-doctor interaction
Images support the messaging about modern technology and expert doctors

file_operations.description: Enhance WhyChooseUsSection by adding a photo gallery or image showcase. Incorporate the following images: frontend/public/assets/generated/dental-equipment-2.dim_800x600.png to showcase modern equipment, frontend/public/assets/generated/dental-equipment-3.dim_800x600.png to highlight sterilization and hygiene setup, and frontend/public/assets/generated/patient-doctor-consultation.dim_800x600.png to show patient care interaction. Consider adding a grid layout alongside or below the existing feature cards, or integrate images within the feature cards themselves. Use the clinic-interior.dim_1200x600.png from existing assets if it complements the new images. Ensure images support the key messages about expert doctors, modern technology, and patient care. Include proper alt text and maintain responsive behavior.

requirements.summary: Ensure all components reference generated images as static assets with proper loading and optimization
acceptanceCriteria: All components reference images from /assets/generated/ path
Images load correctly from the public directory
Image references include appropriate alt text for accessibility
Images are optimized for web display with appropriate dimensions

file_operations.description: Verify that the hero background image reference uses the correct path /assets/generated/hero-dental-office.dim_1920x800.png (relative to the public directory). Ensure the image element or CSS background-image property includes appropriate alt text or aria-label for accessibility. Confirm the image loads properly and is optimized for web display with the correct dimensions (1920x800).

Verify all doctor profile images use paths /assets/generated/doctor-anas-jadla.dim_400x400.png, /assets/generated/doctor-farhan-bangra.dim_400x400.png, and /assets/generated/doctor-jainul-aabedin.dim_400x400.png. Ensure each image element includes descriptive alt text (e.g., 'Dr. Anas Jadla - Dental Professional'). Confirm images are properly sized at 400x400 and load correctly from the public assets directory.

Verify all service and equipment images use correct paths from /assets/generated/ including service-cleaning.dim_600x400.png, service-root-canal.dim_600x400.png, service-implants.dim_600x400.png, dental-equipment-1.dim_800x600.png, dental-equipment-2.dim_800x600.png, patient-doctor-exam.dim_800x600.png, and patient-doctor-consultation.dim_800x600.png. Ensure each image includes contextually appropriate alt text describing the service or equipment shown. Confirm proper dimensions and loading behavior.

Verify all images reference correct paths from /assets/generated/ including dental-equipment-2.dim_800x600.png, dental-equipment-3.dim_800x600.png, and patient-doctor-consultation.dim_800x600.png. Ensure descriptive alt text is included for each image (e.g., 'Modern dental equipment in clinic', 'Sterilization and hygiene setup'). Confirm images load properly and display at optimized dimensions.
